testsPositive.https://Definitelyawebsite.com: should accept valid website with protocol
testsPositive.http://foo.com/blah_blah: should accept valid website with path
testsPositive.http://foo.com/blah_blah:5000/pathhere: should accept valid website with port and path
testsPositive.http://foo.com/blah_blah_(wikipedia): should accept valid website with parentheses in path
testsPositive.http://userid@example.com:8080: should accept valid user website with port
testsPositive.http://userid:password@example.com/: should accept valid user website with password
testsPositive.http://userid:password@example.com:8080/: should accept valid user and password website with path
testsPositive.http://142.42.1.1: should accept valid ipv4 website test 1
testsPositive.http://10.1.1.0: should accept valid ipv4 website test 2
testsPositive.http://10.1.1.255: should accept valid ipv4 website test 3
testsPositive.http://224.1.1.1: should accept valid ipv4 website test 4
testsPositive.http://142.42.1.1:8080/: should accept valid ipv4 website with port
testsPositive.http://Bücher.de: should accept valid website with unicode in domain
testsPositive.http://heynow.ws/䨹: should accept valid website with unicode in path
testsPositive.http://⌘.ws: should accept valid website with only unicode in path
testsPositive.http://⌘.ws/: should accept valid website with only unicode in path and a / after domain
testsPositive.http://foo.com/blah_(wikipedia)#cite-1: should accept valid website with hashtag following parentheses in path
testsPositive.http://foo.com/blah_(wikipedia)_blah#cit: should accept valid website with hashtag in path
testsPositive.http://foo.com/unicode_(✪)_in_parens: should accept valid website with unicode in parentheses in path
testsPositive.http://foo.com/(something)?after=parens: should accept valid website with something after path
testsPositive.http://staging.damowmow.com/: should accept valid website with sub-domain
testsPositive.http://☺.damowmow.com/: should accept valid website with unicode in sub-domain
testsPositive.http://code.google.com/events/#&product=: should accept valid website with variables
testsPositive.ftp://foo.bar/baz: should acccept valid website with ftps
testsPositive.http://foo.bar/?q=Test%20URL-encoded%20s: should accept valid website with encoded stuff in path
testsPositive.http://مثال.إختبار: should accept valid unicode heavy website test 1
testsPositive.http://例子.测试: should accept valid unicode heavy website test 2
testsPositive.http://उदाहरण.परीक्षा: should accept valid unicode heavy website test 3
testsPositive.http://-.~_!$&()*+,;=:%40:80%2f::::::@ex: should accept valid website with user but crazy username
testsPositive.http://1337.net: should accept valid website with just numbers in domain
testsPositive.definitelyawebsite.com?real=yes&page=def: should accept valid website with query
testsPositive.http://a.b-c.de: should accept valid website with dash
testsPositive.http://website.com:3000/?q=400: should accept valid website with port and query
testsPositive.http://asd/asd@asd.com/: should accept valid website with unusual username

testsNegative.http://: should deny invalid website with only http://
should deny invalid website with only http://.
should deny invalid website with only http://..
testsNegative.http://../: should deny invalid website with only http://../
testsNegative.http://?: should deny invalid website with only http://?
testsNegative.http://??: should deny invalid website with only http://??
testsNegative.http://??/: should deny invalid website with only http://??/
testsNegative.http://#: should deny invalid website with only http://#
testsNegative.http://##: should deny invalid website with only http://##
testsNegative.http://##/: should deny invalid website with only http://##/
testsNegative.http://foo.bar?q=Spaces should be encode: should deny invalid website with spaces in path
testsNegative.//: should deny invalid website with only //
testsNegative.//a: should deny invalid website with only //a
testsNegative.///a: should deny invalid website with only ///a
testsNegative.///: should deny invalid website with only ///
testsNegative.http:///a: should deny invalid website with three / in protocol
testsNegative.rdar://1234: should deny invalid website with invalid protocol
testsNegative.h://test: should deny invalid website with missing letters from protocol
testsNegative.http:// shouldfail.com: should deny invalid website with space in beginning of domain
testsNegative.http://should fail: should deny invalid website with space in middle of domain
testsNegative.http://-error-.invalid/: should deny invalid website with dash at beginning and end of domain
testsNegative.http://1.1.1.1.1: should deny invalid ipv4 website with 5 numbers
testsNegative.http://567.100.100.100: should deny invalid ipv4 website with a number out of range
testsNegative.http://-a.b.co: should deny invalid website with dash at beginning of sub-domain
testsNegative.http://.www.foo.bar/: should deny invalid website with dot before sub-domain
testsNegative.httsp://userid@example.com/: should deny invalid website with username and invalid scheme
